title: Expand quiz content to 100 questions, add cookie consent, update dashboard sidebar styling, compare/contact updates, and finance favicon

requirements.text: Expand the quiz question dataset to include 100 meaningful, finance-related quiz questions (mixed finance topics) so the quiz page can run through questions and validate answers properly (not just 2 questions).

quotes: They are only 2 quiz but it should be 100 quiz so add 100 quiz in quiz page it should be run and answer properly

acceptanceCriteria: Quiz flow in `frontend/src/pages/Quiz.tsx` can repeatedly fetch/display questions and submit answers without errors.
Quiz statistics show `totalQuestions` as 100 (once the app considers quiz content initialized/available) rather than 2.

requirements.text: Update the authenticated/private dashboard layout so the entire sidebar navigation background is violet.
acceptanceCriteria: When logged in, the left sidebar (desktop) and the navigation area used for the dashboard menu has a violet background across its full height.
Sidebar text/icons remain readable with sufficient contrast on the violet background.

requirements.text: Implement a cookie-consent popup on public (non-authenticated) pages that includes an Accept button and can be dismissed/remembered after acceptance.

quotes:
add cookies in public pages it need to show cookies
2.entire sidebar violet background 
3.accept button

acceptanceCriteria: A cookie consent UI is shown on public pages until the user clicks Accept.
Clicking Accept hides the popup and persists acceptance (e.g., via localStorage/cookie) so it does not reappear on subsequent visits.
The cookie popup does not appear inside authenticated app pages (e.g., pages rendered inside the private app layout).

requirements.text: Update the displayed contact email address to fwiseai@gmail.com anywhere it appears in the public contact/support UI.

quotes: change the contact email to fwiseai@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx` displays `fwiseai@gmail.com` instead of the previous support email.
No remaining UI text on public contact/support pages shows the old contact email address.

requirements.text: Update the Compare page to remove the “No Ads” and “Video Lessons” rows from the comparison table.

quotes: remove "No ads" and "Video lessons" in the compare page

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/Compare.tsx` no longer renders rows labeled “No Ads” and “Video Lessons”.
The compare table layout remains aligned and visually consistent after removing the rows.

requirements.text: Create and apply a finance-related, logo-like favicon for the site.

quotes:
Plus create and add own favicon
2.finance related favicon logo
2.logo like

acceptanceCriteria: The favicon used by the site reflects the new finance-themed, logo-like design.
The favicon is referenced correctly so it appears in the browser tab when running the frontend.

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI component sources).
Keep quiz behavior/logic unchanged except for adding the required quiz content (do not rewrite the quiz system flow).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding backend persistence for quizzes or cookie consent (implement within the existing frontend patterns unless already supported).
Introducing third-party cookie-consent services or external scripts.
Adding new unrelated pages or features beyond the listed changes.

edits: Redesign into a finance-related, logo-like mark (favicon.svg > favicon.svg)
